name: Bastard Sword
description: A flexible sword with many uses.

name: Battle Axe
description: An axe especially designed for combat

name: Bearded Axe
description: An axe with its weight balanced at the head.

name: Broadsword
description: A sword for slashing, of a category including the cutlass, machete, falchion, and scimitar.

name: Estoc
description: A soldier’s thrusting sword for piercing mail. In the right hands, can be used to ignore chainmail BC.

name: Mace
description: A martial weapon for crushing armor.

name: Morningstar
description: A martial weapon, spiked for piercing mail. Damage becomes bludgeoning versus plate armor.

name: Shortsword
description: A shorter sword of lighter weight, making an ideal sidearm. Similar to the arming sword and gladius.

name: Quarterstaff
description: More than a walking staff, in skilled hands. Improvised trait does not apply when attacking with dexterity.

name: Spear
description: A pointed weapon for throwing or stabbing. Range: 20/60

name: Wakizashi
description: A curved sword of foreign make. Excellent craftsmanship.

name: Warhammer
description: A large hammer, sized for one or two hands.
